title: Dune: Part Two
description: Paul Atreides seeks revenge for his father while deciding between his love and his destiny.

title: Futni mentem
description: A mother and her daughters fulfill the late father's last wish by running a marathon relay.

title: The Wild Robot
description: An emotional story of a robot discovering its ability to evolve beyond its programming.

title: Moana 2
description: Moana and Maui embark on new adventures across lost waters to save their home.

title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
description: A prequel to Mad Max, following the young Furiosa as she fights to survive after being taken from home.

title: Deadpool & Wolverine
description: Deadpool and Wolverine team up in a new adventure facing unexpected challenges.

title: Joker: Folie à Deux
description: The sequel to Joker, exploring the relationship between the Joker and Harley Quinn in a musical format.

title: Gladiator 2
description: The continuation of Gladiator, following the story of Commodus' nephew.
